meanings.definition: A copper-nickel alloy used in making coins and other items.
meanings.sent1: The cupronickel in the coins gives them a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent2: The cupronickel alloy is commonly used in manufacturing various items.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the cupronickel coins for silver ones!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as polished cupronickel.
meanings.sent5: The cupronickel gleamed under the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: An alloy of copper and nickel, typically containing 75% copper and 25% nickel.
meanings.sent1: The cupronickel composition of the alloy gives it unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers often use cupronickel for its durability and corrosion resistance.
meanings.sent3: The cupronickel mixture created a beautiful patina over time.
meanings.sent4: His words were a blend of cupronickel, strong yet flexible.
meanings.sent5: The cupronickel blend created a harmonious balance of strength and malleability.
